segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’ve done this before—they seem so confident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stool looks like it’s about to tip, but he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s face is so hopeful, like she’s dreaming of those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, even though they probably shouldn’t.
segments.speaker: PAR
